resultPayload.note: External channel integration configured and persisted through API.

data.instruction: Configure one external integration/channel and verify sync state + external id linkage is persisted.
data.expectedResult: Connector installation/configuration and sync status are queryable for operational debugging.

resultPayload.note: External channel integration configured and persisted through API.

data.instruction: Query and compare availability + bookings timeline for the entities involved in this scenario.
data.expectedResult: Calendar state reflects booked slots, blocks, and any conflict outcomes from previous steps.

resultPayload.note: Cross-biz read blocked for non-member account.

data.instruction: Using credentials from another context, attempt to read or mutate booking/order resources for this biz.
data.expectedResult: Request is rejected with forbidden/unauthorized error and no data leakage.

resultPayload.note: Cross-biz read blocked for non-member account.

data.instruction: Execute advanced payment path (split tender and/or tip/gift/credit entitlement usage) and persist allocation evidence.
data.expectedResult: Payment trace clearly links payer, tender mix, and booking/order amounts with no ambiguity.
